title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.8 - Right to audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.8 - Right to audit

State Regulations

The appropriate fiscal officer of the county or a duly
designated representative, shall have the right to audit the accuracy of the
payments, distributions and remittances made in accordance with this agreement, upon request, but not more frequently than once in each calendar year at a time
agreed upon by the commissioner and the State Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
29.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
